body_html:
I just installed the build from peterjc123 - it's working!
Note that if you try to use the package in Python 3.6.0, you will get an error upon import. Once I upgraded to 3.6.1 everything ran smoothly. This seems to be a common issue

I just installed the build from peterjc123 - it's working!
Note that if you try to use the package in Python 3.6.0, you will get an error upon import. Once I upgraded to 3.6.1 everything ran smoothly. This seems to be a common issue
body:
I just installed the build from **peterjc123** - it's working!
Note that if you try to use the package in Python 3.6.0, you will get an error upon import. Once I upgraded to 3.6.1 everything ran smoothly. This seems to be a [common issue](https://stackoverflow.com/a/43723021/104668)
